name: Thirty Five Squares
description:
I was only able to make it of Windows and Mac. No Linux for now. Sorry. But if I have files for Linux for Lua I will able to upload for Linux too.

For windows, if some reason if it doesn't work. Please do let me know in the comments. I will connect through team viewer and try to fix it :-)

I have not tested for Mac. I am not sure if it works properly. Sorry again :/
